# Vendors & Manufacturers

This page lists the vendors and manufacturers whose products form the basis of our intelligent database, providing product and material data for masonry and concrete facade work.

## Featured Vendors

### [Euclid Chemical](/docs/vendors/euclid-chemical/)
**Website:** [www.euclidchemical.com](https://www.euclidchemical.com)

Masonry-relevant coatings, sealers, and repair products frequently specified or stocked.

---

### [Hohmann and Barnard](/docs/vendors/hohmann-and-barnard/)
**Website:** [www.h-b.com](https://www.h-b.com)

Masonry anchors, ties, and accessories for structural and architectural applications.

---

### [Heckmann](/docs/vendors/heckmann/)
**Website:** [www.heckmannanchors.com](https://www.heckmannanchors.com)

Masonry anchoring systems and wall tie solutions.

---

### [Wej-it](/docs/vendors/wej-it/)

Concrete anchoring and fastening solutions for masonry and concrete applications.

---

### [Wirebond](/docs/vendors/wirebond/)
**Website:** [www.wirebond.com](https://www.wirebond.com)

Wire reinforcement and masonry reinforcing products.

---

### [Prosoco](/docs/vendors/prosoco/)
**Website:** [www.prosoco.com](https://www.prosoco.com)

Concrete and masonry cleaners, sealers, and restoration products.

---

### [Eacochem](/docs/vendors/eacochem/)
**Website:** [www.eacochem.com](https://www.eacochem.com)

Chemical solutions for concrete and masonry applications.

---

### [Specmix](/docs/vendors/specmix/)
**Website:** [www.specmix.com](https://www.specmix.com)

Pre-blended masonry mortars and grouts for masonry construction.

---

### [Heidelberg Materials](/docs/vendors/heidelberg-materials/)
**Website:** [www.heidelbergmaterials.com](https://www.heidelbergmaterials.com)

Cement, aggregates, and concrete products for construction applications.

---

> _Internal use only. Always confirm product details against current technical data sheets before quoting or specifying._
